header_text: You have a birthday party to go to, and your friends are discussing when they want to go shopping for outfits. Money is tight for you at the moment, and you're worried about being able to afford a new outfit for one event. You decide to wear something already in your closet, and you feel satisfied.

elements.Text: Did you need to spend money on a new outfit?
